welcome.title: Send, Receive & Manage your {network} tokens
welcome.body: Firefly is the official wallet software for {network}.

legal.title: Privacy Policy & Terms of Service
legal.body: Please review the Privacy Policy and Terms of Service.
legal.checkbox: I've read and I accept the Privacy Policy and Terms of Service

chooseProtocol.title: Choose protocol
chooseProtocol.body: Set the protocol for your profile.

chooseNetwork.title: Choose network
chooseNetwork.body: Set the network for your profile.

custom.title: Custom network
custom.body: Support for custom networks and/or nodes

setupCustomNetwork.title: Connect to a custom network or node
setupCustomNetwork.body: Fill the form with the node information and connect to a custom network or node.

setup.title: Set up {network, select, IOTA {an} Shimmer {a} Testnet {a} other {a}} {network} profile
setup.body: Select the appropriate method to set up your {network} profile.

setupNew.title: Create a profile
setupNew.body: You can choose a regular software wallet, or if you have a Ledger device, you can set up a hardware wallet.

softwareAccount.title: Create a software profile
softwareAccount.description: Provides a Stronghold file and recovery phrase

ledgerAccount.title: Create a hardware profile
ledgerAccount.description: Ledger Nano S or Nano X required

setupRecovered.title: Recover {network} profile
setupRecovered.body: If you have an existing mnemonic or Stronghold backup file, you can import it here.
setupRecovered.importLedgerDescription: Restore from your Ledger Nano S or X device

setupClaimed.title: Claim Shimmer staking rewards
setupClaimed.body: Import your IOTA profile and claim your Shimmer staking rewards.

enterName.title: Create your {network} profile
enterName.body1: You can create multiple user profiles to organise your wallets and improve privacy.

body2.first: For now, let's start with your first profile name.
body2.nonFirst: For now, let's start with your profile name.

enterName.addMore: You can add more profiles later.

setupStrongholdPassword.title: Create a password
setupStrongholdPassword.body1: You need a strong password to protect your funds. Use a combination of words, and avoid common phrases, names or dates.
setupStrongholdPassword.body2: It is recommended that you write down your password in your Recovery Kit.

setupPinProtection.title: Set up PIN code
setupPinProtection.body1: Enter a 6-digit PIN below. You will be asked for your PIN to access your profile.

backupMnemonic.title: Back up your recovery phrase
backupMnemonic.body1: You will now be shown a recovery phrase. Write it down in your Recovery Kit.
backupMnemonic.body2: Do not share your recovery phrase with anyone. It can be used to access your tokens from anywhere.
backupMnemonic.body3: If you lose your recovery phrase, you may lose your funds.

viewMnemonic.title: Recovery phrase
viewMnemonic.body1: In your Recovery Kit, write down the words in the exact order shown.
viewMnemonic.body2: Keep this private and safely stored.
viewMnemonic.body3: It is important to have a written backup. Computers often fail and files can corrupt.

verifyMnemonic.title: Verify recovery phrase
verifyMnemonic.body: Let's check you wrote down the phrase correctly. Please select each word in numbered order. Tip: You can press the number next to the word in your keyboard to select it.
verifyMnemonic.verifiedBody: Remember to keep it private and safely stored.

backupStronghold.title: Back up to a Stronghold file
backupStronghold.body1: Enter your password to create a Stronghold backup of your profile. Your password is used to encrypt the backup file.
backupStronghold.body2: Reasons why digital backups are important:
backupStronghold.reason1: Easily recover your wallets without typing in your recovery phrase
backupStronghold.reason2: Import your wallets on other devices

importMnemonicPhrase.title: Enter your recovery phrase
importMnemonicPhrase.body: A recovery phrase is 24 words long, all lower case, with spaces between. This is used to recover existing Firefly profiles.

importStrongholdBackup.title: Import your Stronghold backup
importStrongholdBackup.body: Import a Stronghold backup file to restore your profile.

backupPassword.body2: This is the password you set when you first created your backup.

success.title: You have successfully recovered your backup
success.body: You can now set up your new profile.

claimRewards.title: Your Shimmer staking rewards
claimRewards.body: Check that your Shimmer staking rewards are correct. You may need to search multiple times to find your full balance.

success.title: Shimmer claimed
success.body: You have successfully claimed your Shimmer tokens.

congratulations.title: Profile setup almost complete...
congratulations.body: Your new profile will be ready once the dashboard has successfully loaded.
congratulations.ledgerHint: Do not disconnect your Ledger device until the dashboard has finished loading.
congratulations.softwareMigratedBody: You have successfully migrated your funds to the new network
congratulations.fireflyLedgerBody: Your Ledger profile was successfully recovered and you can now continue.
congratulations.trinityLedgerBody: You have successfully migrated your Ledger to the new network.
congratulations.exportMigration: Export migration log and finish setup

setupLedger.videoGuide: Video guía de la migración de Ledger

ledgerInstallationGuide.title: Have you installed the {network} app on your Ledger device?
ledgerInstallationGuide.body1: Before you proceed, you must use Ledger Live to find and install the {network} app.
ledgerInstallationGuide.body2: Asegúrese de que su firmware Ledger esté actualizado. Cualquier aplicación preinstalada debe actualizarse a sus últimas versiones.

importFromLedger.title: Restaurar o Migrar tú Ledger
importFromLedger.body: Restaurar un perfil existente de Firefly Ledger o migrar tus fondos desde Trinity.
importFromLedger.haveFireflyLedger: Tengo una copia de seguridad de Firefly Ledger
importFromLedger.haveTrinityLedger: Tengo una copia de seguridad de Trinity Ledger

connectLedger.title: Conecta tu Ledger a Firefly
connectLedger.body: Para que su dispositivo Ledger sea encontrado por Firefly, asegúrese de que la aplicación oficial de Ledger Live está cerrada.
connectLedger.unlock: Unlock your Ledger with its pin
connectLedger.openApp: Open the Shimmer app on your Ledger
connectLedger.tips: Sugerencias si tu Ledger no se conecta

restoreFromFireflyLedger.title: Restaurar tu perfil Ledger
restoreFromFireflyLedger.body: Pulse restaurar para completar el proceso de configuración y restaurar sus billeteras, balances y historial de transacciones.

legacyLedgerIntro.title: Comienza tu migración de Ledger usando Firefly
legacyLedgerIntro.body1: Firefly te ayudará a transferir tus tokens a la nueva red Chrysalis.
legacyLedgerIntro.body2: Después de la migración, podrás enviar y recibir tus tokens usando tu Ledger con Firefly.
legacyLedgerIntro.readMore: Qué esperar del proceso de migración

generateNewLedgerAddress.title: Generar nueva dirección
generateNewLedgerAddress.body: Necesitas generar una nueva dirección para migrar tus tokens con Firefly. Haz clic en el botón de abajo para continuar.
generateNewLedgerAddress.confirmBody: Por seguridad, por favor compare la dirección generada en su dispositivo Ledger con la que se muestra a continuación. Si coinciden, pulse ambos botones en su Ledger como se le indique.
generateNewLedgerAddress.confirmedBody: Has confirmado que la dirección en Firefly coincide con la de tu dispositivo Ledger.

switchLedgerApps.title: Cambiar aplicaciones Ledger
switchLedgerApps.body: Por favor, cambia a la app {legacy} en tu dispositivo Ledger para continuar la migración. Cuando esté listo, pulsa continuar.

selectLedgerAccountIndex.title: Elegir índice de cuenta Ledger
selectLedgerAccountIndex.body: Elija el índice de cuenta Ledger que utilizó con Trinity. Para la mayoría de los usuarios este será el índice por defecto de 0.
selectLedgerAccountIndex.reinstallLegacy: Si no es así, desconecte el dispositivo y vuelva a intentarlo. Si el problema persiste, puede que necesite reinstalar la aplicación {legacy}.

general.title: General
general.description: Configure your app's appearance and other general settings

profile.title: Perfil
profile.description: Cambia tu nombre de perfil o establece un avatar

security.title: Seguridad
security.description: Modifica tu contraseña y configura los ajustes de privacidad

advanced.title: Advanced
advanced.description: Tools and manual settings for technical users

helpAndInfo.title: Ayuda & Información
helpAndInfo.description: Encuentra la respuesta a una pregunta u obtén ayuda con un problema

theme.title: Tema
theme.advice: Si cambia el tema del sistema, puede que necesite reiniciar Firefly para ver los efectos

currency.title: Divisa
currency.description: Ajusta la conversión del balanza y actualiza las opciones de las gráficas

notifications.title: Notificaciones
notifications.description: Notificaciones del sistema para eventos de transacción

networkStatus.title: Estado de la red
networkStatus.description: Muestra el estado del nodo al que estás conectado actualmente

exportStronghold.title: Exportar copia de seguridad
exportStronghold.description: Exportar a fichero de Stronghold - una copia completa y encriptada de tus billeteras y el historial de transacciones

appLock.title: Automatic logout
appLock.description: Tiempo de inactividad antes de que se bloqueen tus carteras y se te cierre la sesión

strongholdPasswordTimeout.title: Stronghold Timeout
strongholdPasswordTimeout.description: Length of time before your Stronghold password is required again

maxMediaSize.title: Maximum media size
maxMediaSize.description: NFT media with sizes greater than this limit will not be downloaded and a placeholder representing the media type will be displayed instead

maxMediaDownloadTime.title: Maximum download time
maxMediaDownloadTime.description: NFT media which take longer than this limit to download will be canceled and a placeholder representing the media type will be displayed instead

refreshNftMedia.title: Refresh NFT media
refreshNftMedia.description: NFT media cached for this account will be deleted and then downloaded again

changePassword.title: Modificar contraseña
changePassword.description: Tu contraseña se utiliza para securizar tus billeteras. Debes utilizar una contraseña fuerte para proteger tus fondos

changePincode.title: Cambiar código PIN
changePincode.description: Tu PIN mantiene tu balance y transacciones en privado

changeProfileName.title: Cambiar el nombre de perfil
changeProfileName.description: Cambia tu nombre de perfil de Firefly
changeProfileName.success: Has cambiado tu nombre de perfil

walletFinder.title: Wallet finder
walletFinder.description: Perform an extended search of your previously used wallets

hiddenAccounts.title: Carteras ocultas
hiddenAccounts.description: Seleccionando estas opciones se mostrarán billeteras que previamente estaban ocultas

deleteProfile.title: Eliminar perfil
deleteProfile.description: Elimina todo tu perfil, billeteras y el historial de transacciones. Asegúrate de tener una copia de seguridad

deepLinks.title: Deep links
deepLinks.description: Automatically fill transaction data in Firefly upon clicking a deep link starting with {appProtocol}://

configureNodeList.title: Configuración de nodo
configureNodeList.description: Administra la lista de nodos a los que se conecta tu cartera
configureNodeList.includeOfficialNodeList: Incluir la lista oficial de nodos
configureNodeList.noNodes: No hay nodos, no se puede conectar a la red
configureNodeList.noNodesAuto: No hay nodos, se utilizará la selección automática en su lugar

localProofOfWork.title: Proof of work
localProofOfWork.description: Complete proof of work locally on your device or outsource to the node

errorLog.title: Registro de errores
errorLog.description: Ver errores para depurar un problema

crashReporting.title: Informe de fallos
crashReporting.body: Ayude a los desarrolladores a mejorar Firefly enviando automáticamente datos de diagnóstico cuando ocurre un error o cierre inesperado
crashReporting.advice: Por favor reinicia la aplicación Firefly para {sendCrashReports, select, true {empezar a compartir informes de errores} false {dejar de compartir informes de fallos} other {aplicar este cambio}}

diagnostics.title: Diagnósticos
diagnostics.description: Ver información del sistema y la aplicación

migrateLedgerIndex.title: Migrar índice de Ledger
migrateLedgerIndex.description: Migrar otro índice de cuenta Trinity

troubleshoot.title: Resolución de problemas
troubleshoot.description: Usa el asistente de resolución de problemas para solucionar problemas comunes

documentation.title: Documentación
documentation.description: Ver la documentación para obtener explicaciones detalladas sobre cómo funcionan las cosas

faq.title: FAQ
faq.description: Ver las preguntas frecuentes resueltas para obtener ayuda con un problema o pregunta común

discord.title: Discord
discord.description: Obtén ayuda de la comunidad IOTA en Discord

reportAnIssue.title: Informar de un problema
reportAnIssue.description: Reportar un error a los desarrolladores. Asegúrate de que todavía no ha sido reportado

developerToggle.title: Developer Mode
developerToggle.description: Switch developer mode on to enable more features in experimental state

login.pleaseWait: Por favor, espera {time, plural, one {# segundo} other {# segundos}}
login.incorrectAttempts: {attempts, plural, one {# intento incorrecto} other {# intentos incorrectos}}
login.hintStronghold: Your Stronghold's version is out of date. Please log in to update your Stronghold.

statuses.appNotOpen: Ledger unlocked but app not open
statuses.mnemonicMismatch: Palabras de seguridad o Ledger incorrecto

errors.aliasAddressWrongFormat: Must be in either hex or Bech32 format

confirmLedgerEvmAddress.title: Confirm EVM address
confirmLedgerEvmAddress.header: We have generated your EVM address

connectLedgerDevice.title: Connect Ledger Device
connectLedgerDevice.body: For your Ledger device to be found by Firefly, please ensure that the official Ledger Live application is closed before following these steps.

requirements.openApp: Open the Ethereum app on your Ledger

staking.welcome: Bienvenido al panel de control del staking!

status.inactive: No se ha detectado ningún Staking

headers.inactive: No se han detectado eventos de Staking

bodies.upcoming: Pon en stake tus {token} tokens para recibir automáticamente recompensas cada 10 segundos una vez que el periodo de staking comience el {date}.
bodies.commencing: Pon en stake tus {token} tokens para recibir automáticamente recompensas cada 10 segundos una vez que el periodo de staking comience el {date}.
bodies.holdingAndNotStaking: Pon en stake tus {token} tokens para recibir recompensas cada 10 segundos.
bodies.endedAndDidStake: Las recompensas de {token} se distribuirán en tu cartera una vez que se lance la red.
bodies.endedAndDidNotReachMinRewards: No has hecho Stake con los suficientes {token} tokens para alcanzar las recompensas mínimas.
bodies.inactive: Abra la configuración de red en la configuración avanzada y asegúrese de que el nodo actual tiene la función "Participación" haciendo clic en "Ver información".

assembly.name: Assembly
assembly.description: Assembly is a permissionless, highly scalable multi-chain network to build and deploy composable smart contracts. Assembly is the future of web3.

shimmer.name: Shimmer
shimmer.description: La red incentivada de pruebas para promover innovaciones de gran calado en IOTA. Lo que sea, sucederá: la evolución de Shimmer depende de ti.

gallery.title: Collectibles
gallery.emptyDescription: Deposit or Receive your first collectible now!

details.storageDepositDescription: A refundable deposit required to store your NFT on the Tangle.

proposals.title: Proposals
proposals.successAddAll: {numberOfProposals, select, one {Proposal} other {Proposals}} successfully added to all accounts

details.hintVote: You can not vote on a proposal that is in the announcement phase, voting will open in {time}.

update.title: Update Stronghold
update.loginBody: Your Stronghold's version is out of date. Provide your password to update Stronghold.
update.recoveryBody: The imported Stronghold’s version is out of date, to continue we will need to update the stronghold to the latest version.

updateBackup.loginBody: It's all good now - you're running the latest Stronghold version
updateBackup.recoveryTitle: Stronghold is successfully recovered and updated
updateBackup.recoveryBody: You can now continue setting up your wallet
updateBackup.hint: We highly recommend to delete all previous Stronghold backup files and save a new one

changePassword.hint: Your Stronghold was out of date and has been updated. We recommend that you change your Stronghold password.

enableLedgerBlindSigning.title: Enable Blind Signing
enableLedgerBlindSigning.info: In order to confirm this transaction you need to enable Blind Signing on your ledger device.
enableLedgerBlindSigning.step_1: Connect and unlock your Ledger Device
enableLedgerBlindSigning.step_3: Press the right button to navigate to Settings. Then press both buttons to validate. Your Ledger device displays Blind Signing.
enableLedgerBlindSigning.step_4: Press both buttons to enable transaction blind signing. The device displays Enabled. You're done.

storageDeposit.title: Storage deposit
storageDeposit.subtitle: These funds are reserved for storing native assets.

foundryOutputs.title: Foundries
foundryOutputs.subtitle: Reserved for Native Token Foundry storage

storageDepositReturn.title: SDRUC
storageDepositReturn.subtitle: Temporarily locked in Storage Deposit Return

minimizeStorageDeposit.title: Minimize storage deposit
minimizeStorageDeposit.description: Consolidate outputs to minimize your required storage deposit and increase your available balance.

password.title: Contraseña requerida
password.subtitle: Please provide your password to unlock your wallets
password.backup: Por favor, introduce tu contraseña para exportar una copia de seguridad

appUpdate.title: Check for updates
appUpdate.updatesDisabled: There are updates available, but in-app upgrade is disabled for your operating system.
appUpdate.latestInstalled: You are running the latest and safest version

backupStronghold.title: Backup your stronghold file
backupStronghold.body: It is important to back up your wallet regularly to ensure you have a copy of your wallets and transaction history. If you lose your backup and recovery phrase you will lose access to your funds.

deeplinkAccountSwitch.title: Select a wallet
deeplinkAccountSwitch.body: You just followed a deep link. Please select the wallet with which you want to continue.

deeplinkError.title: Failed link
deeplinkError.body: This link failed or is invalid. Please try again or double check the source of the link.

deleteAccount.title: ¿Eliminar {name}?
deleteAccount.body: Are you sure you want to delete this wallet?
deleteAccount.hint: Note: once deleted, you can restore this wallet by using the "Wallet Finder" in the settings.
deleteAccount.typePassword: Escribe la contraseña de tu cartera para confirmar.
deleteAccount.errorBody1: No puedes eliminar esta cartera, debes tener al menos una.

externalUrl.title: Open URL in Browser
externalUrl.body: Are you sure you want to open "{url}" in the browser?
externalUrl.hint: This URL is unknown to Firefly. Please double check the URL before opening it.
externalUrl.invalidProtocol: Cannot open URL with invalid protocol

hideAccount.title: ¿Ocultar {name}?
hideAccount.body: Puedes encontrar esta cartera más tarde activando "Mostrar carteraras ocultas" en Configuración Avanzada.
hideAccount.typePassword: Escriba la contraseña de su cartera para confirmar.
hideAccount.errorBody1: Para ocultar una cartera debe tener balance 0.
hideAccount.errorBody2: Actualmente tienes {balance} restantes en esta cartera. Por favor mueve estos fondos a una cartera distinta y prueba de nuevo.
hideAccount.errorBody3: No puedes ocultar esta cartera, debes tener al menos una.

excludeNode.title: Exclude node
excludeNode.body: Are you sure you want to exclude {url} from the available node pool?

unsetAsPrimaryNode.title: Clear primary node
unsetAsPrimaryNode.body: Are you sure you want to clear {url} as the primary node?

node.removeConfirmation: ¿Estás seguro de que quieres eliminar este nodo?

switchNetwork.title: Cambiar de red
switchNetwork.resetWarning: Cambiar redes te cerrará la sesión y restablecerá todas las cuentas, los saldos y el historial de transacciones de este perfil.

errorLog.title: Registro de errores
errorLog.empty: El registro de errores está vacío.

deleteProfile.title: Eliminar perfil
deleteProfile.confirmation: ¿Estás seguro de que quieres eliminar este perfil? Esta operación no se puede deshacer.

transaction.title: Send asset
transaction.body: Estás a punto de enviar {amount} a
transaction.surplusIncluded: This transaction contains a surplus amount. Please double check this is the amount you want to send.
transaction.sendingFromStakedAccount: Estás enviando una transferencia desde una cartera que está haciendo Staking. Esto puede desvincular tus tokens. Puedes enviar la transferencia sin problemas, pero puede que necesites reiniciar el Staking de los tokens restantes después.
transaction.sendingFromStakedAccountBelowMinReward: Estas realizando una transferencia desde una cartera que no ha alcanzado la recompenza minima de staking. Esto podria remover el stake de estas monedas y podrias perder las recompenzas en esta cartera.

walletFinder.title: Wallet finder
walletFinder.body: Perform a more exhaustive search of addresses to find missing balances and wallets.
walletFinder.searchAgainHint: Is your balance or number of wallets incorrect? Search again until your full balance is shown.

riskFunds.title: Advertencia: fondos en riesgo durante la migración
riskFunds.body1: Se recomienda encarecidamente que asegures todos sus fondos antes de proceder con la migración. Tus fondos están en riesgo de robo si no los aseguras.
riskFunds.body2: Se recomienda que vuelvas a ejecutar el proceso para direcciones con un nivel de riesgo medio o superior.

missingBundle.title: Advertencia: fondos en riesgo durante la migración
missingBundle.body: Tienes fondos en direcciones gastadas, pero no se ha encontrado la información necesaria para asegurarlas. Esto puede suceder si has realizado transacciones hace mucho tiempo. Puedes continuar, pero {value} están en riesgo durante la migración.
missingBundle.learnMore: Aprende más sobre las direcciones gastadas

snapshot.title: Mejora de red en marcha
snapshot.body: La mejora de la red Chrysalis ha empezado.
snapshot.bodyMigration: La migración está desactivada hasta que esté completada.
snapshot.bodyFirefly: Firefly está desactivado hasta que esté completado. La migración seguirá siendo posible después.

ledgerNotConnected.title: Connect your Ledger
ledgerNotConnected.notConnected: Connect your Ledger device to continue.
ledgerNotConnected.locked: Unlock your Ledger device to continue.
ledgerNotConnected.appNotOpen: Open the Shimmer app on your Ledger device to continue.

ledgerConfirmation.confirm: Para continuar, confirme el mensaje que se muestra en su dispositivo Ledger

steps.0: Instalar y abrir la aplicación Ledger Live
steps.1: Asegúrate de que tu Ledger está conectado
steps.2: Search for the {legacy} app. You may need to enable Ledger Live developer mode.
steps.4: Recuerda que es importante cerrar Ledger Live antes de regresar a Firefly

ledgerConnectionGuide.title: Sugerencias si tu Ledger no se conecta

steps.0: Asegúrate de que Ledger Live no esté abierto en tu ordenador
steps.1: Asegúrese de que ha desbloqueado su dispositivo Ledger con su PIN
steps.2: Abra la nueva aplicación IOTA en tu dispositivo Ledger

3.link: Prueba la página oficial de soporte de Ledger

verifyLedgerTransaction.title: Verify transaction
verifyLedgerTransaction.info: Compare and confirm the transaction information displayed on your ledger device against the information below.

verifyInternalLedgerTransaction.title: Verify internal transaction
verifyInternalLedgerTransaction.info: Please confirm the internal transaction on your ledger.
verifyInternalLedgerTransaction.hint: All assets will remain on your wallet when sending an internal transaction.

ledgerAddress.title: Confirmar dirección de recepción
ledgerAddress.body: Confirma que la dirección de recepción mostrada en tu Ledger coincide con la que se muestra a continuación. Si coinciden, pulsa ambos botones de tu Ledger como se le ha indicado.

ledgerMigrateIndex.title: ¿Necesitas migrar otro índice de cuenta Trinity?
ledgerMigrateIndex.body: También puedes migrar más tarde en Configuración Avanzada.

exportTransactionHistory.title: Exportar el historial de transacciones
exportTransactionHistory.body: Exporta el historial de transacciones de la cartera seleccionada. El archivo exportado estará en formato .csv.
exportTransactionHistory.typePassword: Escribe tu contraseña para permitir la exportación

stakingManager.title: Gestión de Staking
stakingManager.description: Cuando pones una cartera en staking, estás enviándote una transacción a ti mismo marcando esos fondos como "staked". Podrás transferir esos tokens en cualquier momento, pero dejarás de recibir las recompensas del staking correspondientes.
stakingManager.stakedSuccessfully: Tus fondos se han Stakeado para {account}.
stakingManager.unstakedSuccessfully: Tus fondos han sido quitados de Staking para {account}.
stakingManager.singleAccountHint: Looking for your wallets? Firefly has changed. Toggle between your wallets in the top menu bar.

stakingConfirmation.title: Confirmar participación
stakingConfirmation.subtitleStake: Estás a punto de iniciar el Staking
stakingConfirmation.multiAirdropWarning: Si no deseas participar en ambos Airdrop, puedes escoger no hacerlo debajo. Puedes dejar el staking y retomarlo en cualquier momento.
stakingConfirmation.mergeStakeWarning: Tus fondos serán puestos en staking para el {airdrop}. Para cambiar los airdrops en los que quieres participar, saca esta cartera del staking y vuelve a ponerla en staking de nuevo.

newStakingPeriodNotification.title: Fase del staking {periodNumber} de {date}
newStakingPeriodNotification.body: El staking de IOTA por Assembly continua... Participa en la fase {periodNumber} durante 90 días. ¡Pon en stake tus tokens IOTA y gana recompensas ASMB!
newStakingPeriodNotification.info: El staking de Shimmer se ha completado y sólo se distribuirán token ASMB.

shimmer-info.title: Sobre Shimmer
shimmer-info.body1: Enhorabuena, has ganado tokens SMR como recompensa a tu staking. Shimmer es una red incentivada de staking para testear actualizaciones de gran calado en IOTA.
shimmer-info.body2: We aim to launch Shimmer in 2022. Your tokens will become available to transfer once the network launches.

assembly-info.title: Sobre Assembly
assembly-info.body1: Enhorabuena, has ganado tokens ASMB como recompensa por tu staking. Assembly es una red multi-cadena para desplegar contratos inteligentes escalables en IOTA.
assembly-info.body2: We aim to launch Assembly in 2022. Your tokens will become available to transfer once the network launches.

confirmDeveloperProfile.title: Estas creando un perfil para desarrolladores
confirmDeveloperProfile.body: Te conectarás a Chrysalis Devnet por defecto y podrás cambiar de red manualmente. Continúa sólo si sabes lo que estas haciendo.

crashReporting.title: Informes de fallos
crashReporting.body: Ayude a los desarrolladores a mejorar Firefly enviando automáticamente datos de diagnóstico cuando ocurra un error o cierre inesperado. Esto tomará efecto después de reiniciar Firefly.
crashReporting.checkbox: Enviar informe de fallos a la Fundación IOTA

legalUpdate.tosAndPrivPolicyBody: Hemos actualizado los Términos de Servicio y Política de Privacidad de Firefly.
legalUpdate.tosBody: Hemos actualizado los Términos de Servicio de Firefly.
legalUpdate.privPolicyBody: Hemos actualizado nuestra Política de Privacidad.
legalUpdate.tosAndPrivPolicyCheckbox: He leído y acepto los Términos del Servicio y Política de Privacidad
legalUpdate.tosCheckbox: He leído y acepto los Términos de Servicio
legalUpdate.privPolicyCheckbox: He leído y acepto la Política de Privacidad

singleAccountGuide.title: La forma en que usas Firefly ha cambiado
singleAccountGuide.body: El contenido de cada pestaña se encuentra ahora en el contexto de una única cartera. Puede cambiar la cartera seleccionada desde cualquier lugar usando el conmutador en la barra de título.
singleAccountGuide.hint: ¿No encuentras una cartera? Usa el buscador de saldo en la configuración para descubrir las carteras usadas anteriormente.

tokenInformation.verificationWarning: This token is unverified. Compare the token metadata against the relevant team’s official website. Only verify tokens that you trust.

noAlias.title: Unable to mint
noAlias.description: You must own an alias output to mint native tokens. To continue, please create an alias first

errors.invalidMimetype: Invalid MimeType, check if the file type is supported
errors.quantityTooSmall: Quantity needs to be greater than 0
errors.quantityTooLarge: Quantity needs to be smaller than 64
errors.invalidURI: Invalid URI, please provide a valid URI
errors.notReachable: URI not reachable, unable to check NFT type
errors.royaltiesMustBeJSON: Royalties must be a valid JSON
errors.invalidAddress: Invalid address, must be a valid {networkHrp} address where royalties will be sent to
errors.invalidRoyaltyValue: Invalid value, it must be a numeric decimal representative of the percentage required ie. 0.05
errors.invalidRoyaltyValueSum: Invalid value, the sum of all royalties must be less than or equal to 1'
errors.attributesMustBeJSON: Attributes must be a valid JSON
errors.attributesMustBeArrayOfObjects: Attributes must be an array of objects
errors.attributesInvalidKeys: Invalid key, attributes must have the keys "trait_type" and "value"
errors.attributesInvalidValues: Invalid value, "trait_type" must be a non empty string and "value" must be a non empty string or a number

faucetRequest.title: Faucet request
faucetRequest.body: Are you sure you want to request {token} tokens from the {network} faucet?

manageVotingPower.title: Manage voting power
manageVotingPower.body: Define your voting power to vote on proposals.
manageVotingPower.hint: All funds that you allocate to voting are locked. In order to make them spendable again, you need to decrease your voting power. This affects all proposals with an active vote.
manageVotingPower.amountZero: Please be aware that setting your voting power to zero will stop all your votes for all proposals you are currently voting on.

addProposal.title: Add proposal
addProposal.body: Please provide the information listed below to add a proposal.
addProposal.addToAllAccounts: Add the proposal to all accounts

editProposal.title: Edit proposal
editProposal.body: Please provide the new url for the node that contains this proposal.

voteForProposal.title: Vote for proposal
voteForProposal.body: You're about to vote for {proposal} proposal.
voteForProposal.hasAbstained: You are abstaining from answering {numberOfQuestions, plural, one {# question} other {# questions}}.
voteForProposal.noVotingPower: You do not have any voting power. Please increase your voting power from the Governance dashboard.

revote.title: Revote on proposals
revote.body: Changing your voting power temporarily stops your votes for all proposals from being counted. Simply click "Revote" to resume voting.
revote.hint: Firefly remembers all of the proposals and answer options you previously voted for.

removeProposal.title: Remove proposal
removeProposal.body: Are you sure you want to remove this proposal?
removeProposal.hint: Please note that removing a proposal during the counting period will stop your votes but won't impact any votes that have already been counted.

stopVoting.title: Stop voting
stopVoting.body: You're about to stop voting for the {proposalName} proposal.
stopVoting.hint: Please note that stopping voting during the counting period won't impact any votes that have already been counted.

nodeAuthRequired.title: Authentication required
nodeAuthRequired.body: This node requires additional authentication. Please fill in the appropriate information.

confirmRejection.title: Reject transaction
confirmRejection.description: Are you sure you want to reject this transaction?
confirmRejection.node: Please note that rejecting a transaction only hides it from your Activity feed

confirmTokenBurn.title: Burn {assetName}
confirmTokenBurn.hint: Please note that burning a token may free storage deposit attached to it and is not reversible

confirmNftBurn.title: Burn {nftName}
confirmNftBurn.description: Are you sure you want to burn this NFT?
confirmNftBurn.hint: Please note that burning an NFT frees the storage deposit attached to it and is not reversible.

restoreWalletDescription.iota: Migrate to Chrysalis or restore an existing wallet
restoreWalletDescription.custom: Restore an existing Custom Network profile

refreshNftMedia.title: Refresh NFT media
refreshNftMedia.description: Do you want to delete and re-download all NFT media for this account?

actions.createWalletDescription: Create a fresh profile running on {network, select, iota {Chrysalis} shimmer {Shimmer} testnet {Testnet} custom {Custom Network} other {Unknown}}

actions.saveBackupFile: Guardar archivo de copia de seguridad

actions.downloadRecoveryKit: Guardar plantilla de Kit de Recuperación

general.availableBalanceTooltip: An asset's total balance minus any funds that are required to cover the storage deposit (i.e. funds that are locked in pending transactions, reserved for Native Tokens, or reserved for NFTs).

general.mintNativeTokenDescription: Mint native token following IRC30 standard

general.refreshTokenMetadataHint: This will reset all your tokens' metadata including the verification status and unhide any hidden assets.

password.tooWeak: Tu nueva contraseña es demasiado débil.
password.row: Las filas de teclas seguidas son fáciles de adivinar.

password.sameAsOld: Your new password must be different from your old password.

pincode.length: Tu PIN debe tener {length, plural, one {# dígito} other {# dígitos}} de longitud.

account.addressNotFound: The address cannot be found in your account.

partiallyStakedFunds.body: Tienes que activar manualmente el staking para estos nuevos fondos para recibir las recompensas de airdrop.

stakingMinRewards.title: Por debajo del valor mínimo de recompensa
stakingMinRewards.bodyMinBalance: Esta cartera no tiene suficientes tokens IOTA para alcanzar la recompensa mínima de airdrop y por lo tanto no puede entrar en modo Stake.
stakingMinRewards.continue: Por favor continúa con el staking por otros {duration}.
stakingMinRewards.bodyBelowMin: Esta cartera no ha alcanzado el valor mínimo de recompensa para {airdrop} ({airdropRewardMin}).
stakingMinRewards.bodyWillReachMin: Debes hacer Stake por otros {duration} para alcanzar el mínimo.
stakingMinRewards.bodyWillNotReachMin: No alcanzarás la cantidad mínima de recompensas durante el periodo restante de Stake a menos que añadas más IOTA.
stakingMinRewards.bodyDidNotReachMin: No has hecho Stake con la suficiente cantidad de IOTA para alcanzar las recompensas mínimas de {airdrop} ({airdropRewardMin}).
stakingMinRewards.bodyMinBalanceAirdrop: Esta cartera no tiene suficientes tokens IOTA para alcanzar la recompensa mínima de airdrop de {airdrop}.

tooltips.optionalInput: This optional data will be public on the explorer and viewable by everyone.

minting.storageDeposit: A refundable token deposit needed to store your transaction on the Tangle.
minting.giftedStorageDeposit: The storage deposit for this transaction was gifted to you. You do not need to refund the deposit.
minting.expirationTime: Claim these funds before the expiration time or they will be returned to the sender.
minting.timelockDate: The sender set a timelock on these funds. You will be able to spend them once the timelock expires.
minting.metadata: An optional data field for storing data persistently on the Tangle.
minting.tag: A short optional data field. Tagging groups of transactions can make them easier to search for.

incoming.storageDeposit: A refundable token deposit needed to store your transaction on the Tangle.
incoming.giftedStorageDeposit: The storage deposit for this transaction was gifted to you. You do not need to refund the deposit.
incoming.expirationTime: Claim these funds before the expiration time or they will be returned to the sender.
incoming.timelockDate: The sender set a timelock on these funds. You will be able to spend them once the timelock expires.
incoming.metadata: An optional data field for storing data persistently on the Tangle.
incoming.tag: A short optional data field. Tagging groups of transactions can make them easier to search for.
incoming.gasBudget: Gas budget is required to conduct a transaction or execute a smart contract function on Shimmer EVM.

outgoing.storageDeposit: A storage deposit is a refundable deposit needed to store your transaction on the Tangle.
outgoing.giftedStorageDeposit: The recipient does not need to refund the deposit.
outgoing.expirationTime: If the recipient does not claim in time your tokens will be returned to you.
outgoing.timelockDate: You added a timelock to this transaction. The recipient will not be able to spend these funds until the timelock expires.
outgoing.metadata: An optional data field for storing data persistently on the Tangle.
outgoing.tag: A short optional data field. Tagging groups of transactions can make them easier to search for.
outgoing.gasBudget: Gas budget is required to conduct a transaction or execute a smart contract function on Shimmer EVM.

nftMetadata.type: The MimeType of the NFT. e.g. image/png.
nftMetadata.collectionId: UTXO string of the collection NFT that minted this NFT
nftMetadata.royalties: An object containing key-value pairs of addresses that map to payout percentages
nftMetadata.attributes: An array of traits and values that define attributes of the NFT

mintNativeToken.decimals: IRC30 optional parameter: Number of decimals the token uses (divide the token amount by 10^decimals to get its user representation).
mintNativeToken.description: IRC30 optional parameter: The human-readable description of the token.
mintNativeToken.url: IRC30 optional parameter: URL pointing to more resources about the token like a website or social media page.
mintNativeToken.logoUrl: IRC30 optional parameter: URL pointing to an image resource of the token logo.

mintNftForm.collectionId: Optional parameter: UTXO string of the collection NFT that minted this NFT
mintNftForm.royalties: Optional parameter: An object containing key-value pairs of addresses that map to payout percentages
mintNftForm.issuerName: Optional parameter: The name of the creator
mintNftForm.description: Optional parameter: A description of the NFT
mintNftForm.attributes: Optional parameter: An array of traits and values that define attributes of the NFT
mintNftForm.uri: To create a URI using custom media, first upload your file to IPFS via a storage service (e.g. https://nft.storage/)
mintNftForm.quantity: Optional parameter: The quantity of copies minted with this metadata.

resultsNotAvailable.title: Results not available
resultsNotAvailable.body: The results are no longer available on this proposal's corresponding node. Please update it to access the results.
